coded_answer.p: I am very happy to have won the first prize in your competition. It is a wonderful surprise.
I can go to the Camp California only in July, because I have school in June and I must work in my father's bookshop in August.
At the Camp I want to livestay in a log cabin. I do not like the tents; one can find insects in them and they are not as comfortable as log cabins.

For the two activities I can choose, I would like to play tennis: I have some experience inof this sport, because I played tennis duringfor seven years and it is still my favourite activity. I would try to do some painting, too, but I have never painted.

I would like to know what sort of clothes I have to take (if it is going to be rainy or to be sunny) and how much money I must have with me. Could you tell me what sort of materialequipment I will have to bring to do the activities?

Do you know, last week I have beenwent to a pop concert to help my uncle, who is the director of the stadium of Lugano. It was very interrestinginteresting, because I did different things. I cooked a meal for the artists, I spoke with the manager of Bruce SpringsteenBruce Springsteen's manager and I helped a technician to install his materialequipment: the lights.

The best part of the day was after the concert, when I met the group "U2". I was very excited, because this is my favourite group: I'm always hearinglistening to their songs. I took some photographiesphotographs and I'll show them to you when you come next week
I had a talktalked with Santana, the best guitarist in the world, too. He's quite old, but very attractive. I would like playingto play guitar like him.
What a great day it was. The next concert is on 19th June and I will be herethere.
